00027 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.XFN

00032     public class XFNList
00033     {
00034         #region Constructor
00035 
00039         public XFNList()
00040         {
00041             People = new List<People>();
00042         }
00043 
00044         #endregion
00045 
00046         #region Public Properties
00047 
00051         public List<People> People{get;set;}
00052 
00053         #endregion
00054 
00055         #region Public Overridden Function
00056 
00061         public override string ToString()
00062         {
00063             try
00064             {
00065                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00066                 foreach (People CurrentPerson in People)
00067                 {
00068                     Builder.Append(CurrentPerson.ToString());
00069                 }
00070                 return Builder.ToString();
00071             }
00072             catch { throw; }
00073         }
00074 
00075         #endregion
00076     }
00077
